name: saoke_huydong_batch
description: This table represents a batch of financial transactions, detailing various attributes related to accounts, interest, and client information.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the batch was executed.

columns.name: nhom_cn
columns.description: The code representing the group of transactions.

columns.name: cn
columns.description: The code for the branch handling the transaction.

columns.name: ten_cn
columns.description: The name of the branch handling the transaction.

columns.name: ma_loai
columns.description: The code representing the type of transaction.

columns.name: thi_truong
columns.description: The market in which the transaction takes place.

columns.name: thanhphan_kinhte
columns.description: The economic component associated with the transaction.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: The unique number identifying the account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The period over which the transaction is relevant.

columns.name: period_type
columns.description: The type of period (e.g., monthly, quarterly).

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: The code for the general ledger account associated with the transaction.

columns.name: loai_tien
columns.description: The type of currency used in the transaction.

columns.name: tk2
columns.description: A secondary account related to the transaction.

columns.name: tk3
columns.description: A tertiary account related to the transaction.

columns.name: tk_nhnn
columns.description: The account with the central bank related to the transaction.

columns.name: laisuat
columns.description: The interest rate applied to the transaction.

columns.name: tienlai_duchi
columns.description: The interest amount that is due but not yet paid.

columns.name: tienlai_thucchi
columns.description: The interest amount that has been paid.

columns.name: kyhan_loaitien
columns.description: The currency term associated with the transaction.

columns.name: loai_kyhan
columns.description: The type of maturity term for the transaction.

columns.name: kyhan_so
columns.description: The number representing the maturity term.

columns.name: laisuat_dcv
columns.description: The discount interest rate applied to the transaction.

columns.name: tien_denhan
columns.description: The amount due at maturity.

columns.name: ngay_daohan
columns.description: The date when the transaction matures.

columns.name: songay_conlai
columns.description: The number of days remaining until maturity.

columns.name: client_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: client_name
columns.description: The name of the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ngay_moso_datetime
columns.description: The timestamp when the account was opened.

columns.name: ngay_moso
columns.description: The date when the account was opened.

columns.name: acct_type
columns.description: The type of account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: acct_type_desc
columns.description: A description of the type of account.

columns.name: ma_nguoiquanly
columns.description: The code identifying the manager responsible for the account.

columns.name: ten_nguoiquanly
columns.description: The name of the manager responsible for the account.

columns.name: client_type
columns.description: The type of client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: closing_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the account was closed.

columns.name: profit_centre
columns.description: The profit center associated with the transaction.

columns.name: sodu
columns.description: The balance of the account at the time of the transaction.

columns.name: sodu_qd
columns.description: The account balance in the local currency.

columns.name: ngaymo_cif
columns.description: The date when the CIF (Customer Information File) was opened.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state or province associated with the transaction.

columns.name: country
columns.description: The country associated with the transaction.

columns.name: class_5
columns.description: A classification code for the transaction.

columns.name: industry
columns.description: The industry sector associated with the transaction.

columns.name: business
columns.description: The type of business associated with the transaction.

columns.name: major_category
columns.description: The main category of the transaction.

columns.name: cmnd_mst
columns.description: The identification number or tax code of the client.

columns.name: registered_branch
columns.description: The branch where the client is registered.

columns.name: registered_date
columns.description: The date when the client was registered.

columns.name: registered_state
columns.description: The state where the client is registered.

columns.name: registered_state_desc
columns.description: A description of the registration state.

columns.name: ngay_taituc
columns.description: The date when the account or transaction was renewed.

columns.name: date_sync_date
columns.description: The date when the data was synchronized.

columns.name: sodu_tattoan
columns.description: The final balance of the account at closure.

columns.name: ngay_tattoan
columns.description: The date when the account was closed.
